SELECT om.user_code, om.order_code,
pd.prd_code, pd.prd_name, pd.prd_main_image, pd.prd_regular_price, pd.prd_discount_price, pd.prd_discount_percentage,
om.payment_status, om.order_status, om.cs_status, om.payment_amount, om.create_date from order_mst om LEFT OUTER JOIN product pd ON(pd.prd_code = om.prd_code) where om.user_code = #{userCode} order by order_code desc

select ct.cart_id, rs.user_code,
pt.prd_code, pt.prd_name, pt.prd_regular_price, pt.prd_discount_price, pt.prd_discount_percentage, pt.prd_main_image,
ct.cart_product_count, (select count(*) from cart where user_id = #{userCode} ) as item_count from cart ct left outer join register rs on(rs.user_code = ct.user_id) left outer join product pt on(pt.prd_code = ct.prd_code) where rs.user_code = #{userCode} order by cart_id desc

select p.user_code, p.point_code, p.point_value, p.expiration_date, p.point_type, p.create_date from register rs left outer join point p on(p.user_code = rs.user_code) where rs.user_code = #{userCode} order by point_code desc
